metadata.title: RHSA-2019:2169: linux-firmware security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Important)
metadata.description:
The linux-firmware packages contain all of the firmware files that are required by various devices to operate.

Security Fix(es):

* kernel: Bluetooth implementations may not sufficiently validate elliptic curve parameters during Diffie-Hellman key exchange (CVE-2018-5383)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.7 Release Notes linked from the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2018-5383 kernel: Bluetooth implementations may not sufficiently validate elliptic curve parameters during Diffie-Hellman key exchange
